column1: In Gamini Dolawatte V. Attorney General [1988] 1 Sri. L. R 221 held that:

column2: “While  a  Medico-Legal  Report  is  admissible  in  evidence  under  Section
414(1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act, hearsay evidence by way
of the case history embodied in such a report is not admissible as such

column3: information  not  ascertained  by  the  Doctor  from  his  own
